entry.title: Virtual Browser: A Comprehensive Guide
entry.summary: TLDR: You can get a virtual browser via Browserling by visiting browserling.com/browse. This short URL instantly loads a virtual browser in your browser. The virtual browser that you get runs on Browserling's servers in a virtual machine that's is isolated from your computer and network. The IP address that a virtual browser uses is Browserling's IP and your IP is never visible to the websites that you visit. Introduction Web browsers are an integral part of our digital lives, serving as the portal through which we explore the Internet. From streaming media to online shopping and social networking, we depend on browsers for a multitude of tasks. Nonetheless, as much as we enjoy being connected online, we also face growing concerns over issues like security, performance, and cross-browser câ€¦

entry.title: How to Access the Tor Network Without Installing the Tor Browser
entry.summary: TLDR: You can use Browserling and get an online Tor browser via browserling.com/tor. Introduction Anonymity and privacy on the Internet have never been more critical. The Tor browser, renowned for its robust privacy features, has long been the go-to option for anonymous browsing. However, not everyone wants to download and install additional software (especially Tor) or might be using a computer where installations are restricted. At Browserling, we created a cloud version of the Tor browser and you can start browsing Onion links directly from your standard web browser. This blog post delves into how you can use an online Tor browser via Browserling without any installations. What Sets the Tor Browser Apart The Tor browser is a specialized web browser built for anonymity and privacy. It acâ€¦
